name: Sisyphus SΙϺULΔΤΘΓ
description:
An uphill struggle against an inevitable fate...

In this game inspired by Katamari, Getting Over It with Bennett Foddy, Breath of the Wild and that greek myth, you play as Sisyphus, a man condemned by the gods to push a boulder uphill, for having cheated death (twice).

Made for the Ludum Dare 50, with the theme: Delay the inevitable
